Package it.polimi.se2018.events.serverclient.modelview

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PatternUpdateEvent
    Class PatternUpdateEvent: model view event that update the pattern of the player
    PlayerDraftPoolUpdateEvent
    Class PlayerDraftPoolEvent: model view event that updates the draft pool
    PlayerIDEvent
    Class PlayerIDEvent: model view event that notifies the view that the id of player is set
    PlayerNameUpdateEvent
    Class PlayerNameUpdateEvent: model view event that update the name of the player
    PlayerPatternUpdateEvent
    Class PlayerPatternUpdateEvent: model view event that updates the pattern of the player
    PlayerPointsUpdateEvent
    Class PlayerPointsUpdateEvent: model view event that update the player's points
    PlayerPrivateUpdateEvent
    Class PlayerPrivateUpdateEvent: model view event that updates the points of the private card
    PlayerTokensUpdateEvent
    Class PlayerTokensUpdateEvent: model view event that updates the left tokens of the player
    PublicDrawEvent
    Class PublicDrawEvent: model view event that delivered the public cards
    RoundTrackerUpdateEvent
    Class RoundTrackerUpdateEvent: model view event that updates the round tracker
    UpdateBoardEvent
    Class UpdateBoardEvent: model view event that updates the board
    UpdatePoolEvent
    Class UpdatePoolEvent: model view event that updates the pool
